dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2362 IS: To prohibit the payment of performance awards in fiscal year 2015 to employees in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Fischer (for herself and Mr. Burr) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the payment of performance awards in fiscal year 2015 to employees in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.

section.header: Prohibition on payment of performance awards to employees in Veterans Health Administration
section.text: Notwithstanding section 5384 of title 5, United States Code, in fiscal year 2015, no performance award shall be paid under such section to employees in the Veterans Health Administration.
